# Visual Commonsense Reasoning
- Given a challenging question about an image, a machine must answer correctly and then provide a rationale justifying its answer
- [From Recognition to Cognition: Visual Commonsense Reasoning](https://arxiv.org/abs/1811.10830)
- 290k multiple choice QA problems derived from 110k movie scenes
- [Adversarial Learning](Adversarial%20Learning.qmd)
